name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity
display_help: You have command over the forces of nature and are able to call forth primal energies to aid your allies and hinder your foes. Many of your powers place a Bloom effect on you and your allies. Each stack of Bloom boosts healing effects on the affected targets by a 4% for 30 seconds. Bloom can stack up to 5 times.

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Corrosive_Sap
powers.display_help: You spray a target with toxic, corrosive Enzymes reducing the damage they deal as well as their damage resistance. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -25.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on target
-25.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on target
-31.25% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Regrowth
powers.display_help: By channeling the energies present in nature you are able to immediately heal yourself and allies in front of you for a small amount of health and cause them to recover a small amount of health over time. Regrowth places a stack of Bloom on its target. NOTE: When used in a PvP zone Regrowth will apply a moderate regeneration effect instead of a heal over time. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged Facing Cone, Minor Ally Heal, Ally Moderate Healing Over Time, +1 Bloom

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 45 ft. radius 90° arc (255 targets max)

display_info: 5 ticks of 20.08 heal over 4.1s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Wild_Growth
powers.display_help: You channel the power of nature into your allies allowing them to more easily shrug off damage and causing their wounds to heal more quickly. Wild Growth increases the damage resistance and boosts the regeneration rate of all affected allies. This power also grants 2 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Long

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 30s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Spore_Cloud
powers.display_help: You create a large cloud of toxic spores around your targeted foe. The target and all nearby foes will have their damage output, chance to hit and regeneration rate reduced. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -28.13% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on target
-28.13% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Lifegiving_Spores
powers.display_help: When activating this power you cause all allies at a selected location to recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds as long as they remain within the Lifegiving Spores. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle (Location AoE), PBAoE +Minor Heal Over Time, +Endurance

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Wild_Bastion
powers.display_help: You encase yourself and nearby allies in a protective barrier that will absorb a moderate amount of damage. Additionally, affected allies will heal for a portion of their health over time. Wild Bastion places 3 stacks of Bloom on all affected targets. Recharge: Long

display_info: 11 ticks of 36.50 heal over 10.1s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Rebirth
powers.display_help: Rebirth can either greatly heal a conscious ally for a large amount of health over time or it can revive a fallen ally with a large amount of health and endurance and cause them to recover health over time. This power also grants 3 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally Rez, +Heal Over Time, Special, +3 Bloom

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Raging_Tempest
powers.display_help: While this power is active there is a high chance that entangling vines will grasp nearby foes and render them held for a short time. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% chance for 2.0 hold for 4s on target
80.00% chance for 1.0 hold for 4s on target
80.00% chance for 2.0 hold for 2s on target

powers.name: Defender_Buff.Nature_Affinity.Overgrowth
powers.display_help: Becoming a conduit of nature itself, you greatly boost the damage, to hit and endurance discount of nearby allies for a long period of time. Overgrowth also grants the affected targets 5 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 82.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 0s on target
74.50% strength to Endurance Cost for 1m 0s on target
